input.sentences: when i got in town i went for a walk .
there were many unique shops there .
i bought a few things and then walked around some more .
after a while i went to my hotel .
output.sentences: In our vacation we took a walk through the town.
They had a lot of unique shops.
We walked some more and bought a few things.
Some of the buildings were awesome.
We finally made it back to our hotel.
